name: Avoid Methods exceeding maximum length (PHP)
description:
This rule searches for all the Methods exceeding the maximum length.
A method is violating the rule when having more than 100 lines of code
output:
This report lists all the Methods exceeding the maximum length.

This QR provides the following information:
Method  full name.
rationale: If a Method exceeds the maximum length this usually indicates that the class is doing too much and will therefore be difficult to understand and maintain.
remediation: Modify the source code of the method to reduce the length.
